Package org.chemicalmozart.model.implementations.reactionrules

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CreateBarRR
    This ReactionRule is used to create a new bar into the main Solution.
    CreateBarRRTest  
    GarbageRR
    This reaction rule is used to remove a Temporary Bar.
    It's easy to match this kind of Bar because it contains a Temporary object.
    GarbageRRTest  
    GetPitchRR
    Description of the class GetPitchRR.
    HarmonicRR1
    This rule computes the degree of harmony that will be played after the current degree.
    HarmonicRR1Test  
    HarmonicRR2
    This rule computes the degree of harmony that will be played after the current degree.
    HarmonicRR3
    This rule computes the degree of harmony that will be played after the current degree.
    HarmonicRR4
    This rule computes the degree of harmony that will be played after the current degree.
    HarmonicRR5
    This rule computes the degree of harmony that will be played after the current degree.
    HarmonicRR6
    This rule computes the degree of harmony that will be played after the current degree.
    MelodicRR
    This ReactionRule is used to create the melodic part of a bar.
    MoveToResultRR
    This ReactionRule is used to put a bar into the result solution.
    PickOneRR
    This ReactionRule is used to pick a Degree in the temporary solution and move it to the main solution.
    RemovePullRR  
    RythmeHRR
    This ReactionRule is used to generate the harmonic part of a measure.
    Starting from a DegreeImpl, it generates a ChordImpl.
    RythmicRR
    This ReactionRule is used to select a rhythmic pattern in a SubSolution identified by a RhythmePull object.
    StartMelodicRR
    This ReactionRule needs the following elements to react :
    SubSolution "BarInCreation" BarInCreation : Object that indicates that the current solution represents a bar in creation. BarNumber : The BarNumber of the current selected solution. BarNumber : Represents the next BarNumber which will be used for the melodic generation. Pitch : Represents the last note played.
    This reaction rule adds to the bar in creation a RythmicRR and a MelodicRR.
    StructuralRR
    Description of the class StructuralRR.
